meanings.definition: The total number of miles traveled
meanings.sent1: The mileages on the odometer showed how far the car had gone.
meanings.sent2: She calculated the mileages for each leg of the journey.
meanings.sent3: The competition was to guess the mileages of the marathon runners.
meanings.sent4: His love for road trips knew no bounds, always chasing higher mileages.
meanings.sent5: The mileages etched in his memory were of the cross-country adventure.

meanings.sent1: The mileages of the racecourse were marked by colorful flags.
meanings.sent2: The hikers were proud of their impressive mileages on the trail.
meanings.sent3: The children's game involved measuring the mileages between trees.
meanings.sent4: The athlete's dedication led to remarkable mileages in training.
meanings.sent5: The map displayed the mileages of the different routes available.

meanings.definition: The amount of wear or use on a vehicle, machine, or other object, expressed in miles
meanings.sent1: The mechanic checked the mileages on the engine to assess its condition.
meanings.sent2: Regular maintenance helps reduce the mileages on the equipment.
meanings.sent3: The old truck proudly displayed its high mileages as a badge of honor.
meanings.sent4: The antique clock's mileages indicated years of faithful service.
meanings.sent5: The worn-out tires revealed excessive mileages on the delivery van.
